api_key.description: Fill your Pinecone AI API key. You can create a api key in [Pinecone Console](https://app.pinecone.io/)
api_key.title: API Key

url.description: Fill in your Pinecone base URL. It is in the form [https://index_name-project_id.svc.environment.pinecone.io]
url.title: Pinecone Base URL
